Name: Keychron K6 Wireless Mechanical Keyboard
Description: RGB backlight, hot-swappable tactile Gateron Blue switches, Bluetooth and USB-C wired modes.

Name: Corsair K70 RGB Pro Mechanical Keyboard
Description: RGB backlight, Cherry MX Red switches, aluminum frame, wired USB connection.

Name: Logitech G502 Hero Gaming Mouse
Description: Adjustable DPI up to 25,600, 11 programmable buttons, weight tuning system.

Name: Razer Viper Mini Gaming Mouse
Description: Ultralight 61g design, 8500 DPI optical sensor, Razer Chroma RGB.

Name: SteelSeries QcK Gaming Mousepad
Description: Smooth cloth surface, non-slip rubber base, optimized for all sensors.

Name: SanDisk Ultra 64GB USB 3.0 Flash Drive
Description: Fast file transfers up to 130MB/s, retractable design.

Name: Samsung BAR Plus 128GB USB 3.1 Flash Drive
Description: Metal casing, up to 300MB/s transfer speeds, water and shock resistant.

Name: Kingston DataTraveler Kyson 256GB USB 3.2 Flash Drive
Description: Ultra-fast speeds up to 200MB/s read, durable metal casing.

Name: Samsung T7 Portable SSD 1TB
Description: USB 3.2 Gen2, up to 1050MB/s read speeds, compact and shock-resistant design.

Name: Crucial X8 2TB Portable SSD
Description: USB-C connectivity, up to 1050MB/s read speeds, durable and stylish.

Name: Seagate Expansion 4TB External HDD
Description: USB 3.0 connectivity, plug-and-play for Windows and Mac.

Name: HyperX Cloud II Gaming Headset
Description: 7.1 Virtual Surround Sound, memory foam ear cushions, detachable noise-canceling mic.

Name: SteelSeries Arctis 5 Wired RGB Gaming Headset
Description: DTS Headphone:X v2.0 surround sound, adjustable RGB lighting, USB and 3.5mm options.

Name: Creative Pebble V3 Desktop Speakers
Description: USB-C powered speakers with Bluetooth 5.0 and 2.25" drivers.

Name: Logitech Z407 Bluetooth Speakers with Subwoofer
Description: 80W peak power, wireless control dial, dual-position satellites.

Name: Logitech C920S Pro 1080p Webcam
Description: Full HD 1080p video, stereo audio, privacy shutter included.

Name: Razer Kiyo Pro Streaming Webcam
Description: 1080p 60FPS, adaptive light sensor, HDR support, wide-angle lens.

Name: Blue Yeti USB Microphone
Description: 4 pickup patterns, plug-and-play, perfect for streaming, podcasting, and voiceovers.

Name: HyperX SoloCast USB Microphone
Description: Plug and play, tap-to-mute sensor, cardioid pickup pattern.

Name: Elgato Wave:3 USB Microphone
Description: Broadcast-grade audio, Wave Link mixing software included, tap-to-mute feature.

Name: Elgato Stream Deck Mini
Description: 6 customizable LCD keys for quick actions in streaming and content creation.

Name: Elgato Stream Deck XL
Description: 32 customizable LCD keys, control over OBS, Twitch, YouTube and more.

Name: Elgato HD60 X Capture Card
Description: 4K60 HDR10 capture, VRR passthrough support, USB 3.0, compatible with PC and consoles.

Name: RESPAWN 110 Racing Style Gaming Chair
Description: Ergonomic design, adjustable footrest, 155-degree recline, bonded leather.

Name: Herman Miller x Logitech G Embody Gaming Chair
Description: Best-in-class ergonomic design, ideal for long gaming sessions.

Name: Anker 7-in-1 USB-C Hub
Description: HDMI, 2 USB-A, SD/TF card reader, USB-C PD charging.

Name: CableMod Pro ModMesh Cable Kit
Description: Premium sleeved cables for modular PSUs, various colors available.

Name: NZXT HUE 2 Ambient RGB Lighting Kit
Description: Ambient lighting for PC setups, addressable RGB strips, software controlled.

Name: Razer Base Station V2 Chroma Headset Stand
